docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs help - Print this help message.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 3 types hostnames
docs.text:
• static hostname
cat /etc/hostname

    kk101.kk
  • pretty hostname
cat /etc/machine-info
  • transient hostname
  # in Linux kernel
  # dynamic, will be lost after a reboot

docs.title: change hostname
docs.text:
• check existing hostname
hostnamectl

docs.title: trojan
docs.text:
Trojan-go 配置信息如下, 请自行复制保存, 密码任选其一 !
服务器地址: kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top  端口: 443
密码1: 124790e2fb
密码2: 1310355fac
密码3: 0e86b5c1d4
密码4: 8b80ec6043
密码5: 568dd0699c
密码6: ec6deddc88
密码7: 43753dedc7
密码8: 997b657987
密码9: 3365439df4
密码10: a4e6bbadc0
您指定前缀的密码共20个: 从 651830202001 到 651830202020 都可以使用
例如: 密码:651830202002 或 密码:651830202019 都可以使用

======================================================================
 Trojan-go 小火箭 Shadowrocket 链接地址
 trojan://124790e2fb@kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top:443?peer=kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top&sni=kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top#kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top_trojan_go

https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?size=400x400&data=trojan%3a%2f%2f124790e2fb%40kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top%3a443%3fpeer%3dkk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top%26sni%3dkk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top%23kk1-v4-n1.qiaokeke.top_trojan_go

docs.title: An example Dockerfile for install git on ubuntu
docs.text:
FROM ubuntu:latest
MAINTAINER "qiaokeke.top"
RUN apt-get install -y git
ENTRYPOINT ["git"]

docs.title: docker install on centos7 or ubuntu
Uninstall old versions
docs.text:
sudo yum remove docker \
        docker-client \
        docker-client-latest \
        docker-common \
        docker-latest \
        docker-latest-logrotate \
        docker-logrotate \
        docker-engine

docs.title: install using repository
docs.text:
• set up the repositories
# yum-utils.noarch : Utilities based around the yum package manager
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager \
    --add-repo \
    https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo

docs.title: install docker engine
docs.text:
• install latest version
sudo yum install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
  • start docker
sudo systemctl start docker
  • verify docker
sudo docker run hello-world
  • enable docker
sudo systemctl enable docker
    Created symlink from /etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants/docker.service to /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service.

docs.title: Connect to MySQL from the MySQL command line client
docs.text:
docker run -it --rm mysql mysql -hsome-mysql -uexample-user -p

alias mysql='sudo docker run -it --rm mysql mysql'

mysql -h172.17.0.1 -u root -p

docs.title: node test
docs.text:
docker run --rm -it node bash
git clone https://github.com/Crawler995/DouyuBarrage-Pro.git
sed -i '2s/localhost/172.17.0.1/' /DouyuBarrage-Pro/dybarrage-server/src/config.ts
sed -i '4s/crawler995/Aa651830/' /DouyuBarrage-Pro/dybarrage-server/src/config.ts
npm install cross-env -g
npm install react-app-rewired -g

docs.title: dy dockerfile
docs.text:
FROM node

RUN npm install cross-env -g && \
    npm install react-app-rewired -g

COPY DouyuBarrage-Pro/ /DouyuBarrage-Pro
COPY start.sh /
RUN chmod +x start.sh

RUN sed -i '2s/localhost/172.17.0.1/' /DouyuBarrage-Pro/dybarrage-server/src/config.ts && \
    sed -i '4s/crawler995/Aa651830/' /DouyuBarrage-Pro/dybarrage-server/src/config.ts

EXPOSE 3000
EXPOSE 3001

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/bash","/start.sh"]

docs.title: dy docker run
docs.text:
docker run --name dy-barrage-200630 -d \
    -p 3000:3000 \
    -p 3001:3001 \
    kk-douyu-barrage-pro:200629

docker run --rm -it \
    -p 3000:3000 \
    -p 3001:3001 \
    kk-douyu-barrage-pro:200630 \
    bash

docs.text:
sudo yum search openjdk
sudo yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel

ll /usr/bin/java
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 22 Aug  6 04:54 /usr/bin/java -> /etc/alternatives/java

/etc/alternatives/java
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 73 Aug  6 04:54 /etc/alternatives/java -> /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.252.b09-2.el7_8.x86_64/jre/bin/java

export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.252.b09-2.el7_8.x86_64

docs.title: new clash
docs.text:
dest=1.1.1.1

iptables -t nat -N CLASH # 新建一个名为 CLASH 的链

iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d $dest -j RETURN # 

iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 0.0.0.0/8 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 10.0.0.0/8 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 127.0.0.0/8 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 169.254.0.0/16 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 172.16.0.0/12 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 192.168.0.0/16 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 224.0.0.0/4 -j RETURN
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -d 240.0.0.0/4 -j RETURN


#iptables -t nat -A CLASH -p tcp -j RETURN -m mark --mark 0xff # 直连 SO_MARK 为 0xff 的流量(0xff 是 16 进制数，数值上等同与上面配置的 255)，此规则目的是避免代理本机(网关)流量出现回环问题
iptables -t nat -A CLASH -p tcp -j REDIRECT --to-ports 7892 # 其余流量转发到 12345 端口（即 V2Ray）
iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp -s 192.168.5.101 -j CLASH # 对局域网其他设备进行透明代理
#iptables -t nat -A OUTPUT -p tcp -j CLASH # 对本机进行透明代理

docs.title: clean
docs.text:
iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -p tcp -s 192.168.5.101 -j CLASH

#iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -p tcp -j CLASH # 对局域网其他设备进行透明代理
#iptables -t nat -D OUTPUT -p tcp -j CLASH # 对本机进行透明代理
iptables -t nat -F CLASH
iptables -t nat -X CLASH

docs.title: AP设置
docs.text:
• AP wan口不要插网线
  • 所有网线都插到lan口
  • dhcp关闭

docs.title: lan口
docs.text:
• 开启dhcp
  • 物理网卡去掉桥接模式
  • 防火墙修改提示
# This file is interpreted as shell script.
# Put your custom iptables rules here, they will
# be executed with each firewall (re-)start.

# Internal uci firewall chains are flushed and recreated on reload, so
# put custom rules into the root chains e.g. INPUT or FORWARD or into the
# special user chains, e.g. input_wan_rule or postrouting_lan_rule.

#如果你是用来做旁路 ，用的是 桥接模式 请把 br-lan 这条规则最前面的 # 号注释掉
#反之如果 不是桥接模式 请把 eth0 这条规则最前面的 # 号注释掉 
#如果你是用来做 主路由 则无需理会！注意：修改后 点 重启防火墙 立即生效
iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p udp --dport 53 -j REDIRECT --to-ports 53
iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --dport 53 -j REDIRECT --to-ports 53
iptables -t nat -I POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE
#iptables -t nat -I POSTROUTING -o  br-lan  -j MASQUERADE

docs.title: close centos 7 firewalld
docs.text:
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo systemctl disable firewalld

docs.title: start centos 7 iptables service
docs.text:
sudo yum install iptables-service
sudo systemctl start iptables.service
sudo systemctl enable iptables.service

docs.title: clear centos 7 iptables default rules
docs.text:
sudo iptables -nvL
sudo iptables -F
sudo service iptables save

docs.title: firewalld
docs.text:
• status firewalld
sudo systemctl status firewalld
  • list-all
sudo firewall-cmd --list-all
  • add-service
sudo firewall-cmd --add-service http

docs.title: start
docs.text: 组成Samba运行的有两个服务，一个是SMB，另一个是NMB；SMB是Samba 的核心启动服务，主要负责建立 Linux Samba服务器与Samba客户机之间的对话， 验证用户身份并提供对文件和打印系统的访问，只有SMB服务启动，才能实现文件的共享，监听139 TCP端口；而NMB服务是负责解析用的，类似与DNS实现的功能，NMB可以把Linux系统共享的工作组名称与其IP对应起来，如果NMB服务没有启动，就只能通过IP来访问共享文件，监听137和138 UDP端口。

docs.title: start smb and nmb
docs.text:
sudo systemctl start smb
sudo systemctl start nmb

sudo systemctl enable smb
sudo systemctl enable nmb

docs.title: Creating Samba Users and Directory Structure
docs.text:
sudo mkdir /home/samba

#Create a new group named sambashare
sudo groupadd sambashare

#Set the /samba directory group ownership to sambashare
sudo chgrp sambashare /home/samba

docs.title: Creating Samba Users
docs.text:
sudo useradd -M -d /home/samba/kksmb -s /usr/sbin/nologin -G sambashare kksmb

# The useradd options have the following meanings:

#     -M -do not create the user’s home directory. We’ll manually create this directory.
#     -d /samba/josh - set the user’s home directory to /samba/josh.
#     -s /usr/sbin/nologin - disable shell access for this user.
#     -G sambashare - add the user to the sambashare group.

sudo mkdir /home/samba/kksmb
sudo chown kksmb:sambashare /home/samba/kksmb

sudo chmod 2770 /home/samba/kksmb

sudo smbpasswd -a kksmb

sudo smbpasswd -e kksmb

docs.title: create a user and group sadmin
docs.text:
sudo useradd -M -d /home/samba/users -s /usr/sbin/nologin -G sambashare sadmin

sudo smbpasswd -a sadmin
sudo smbpasswd -e sadmin

sudo mkdir /home/samba/users

sudo chown sadmin:sambashare /home/samba/users
sudo chmod 2770 /home/samba/users

docs.title: configuring samba shares
docs.text:
sudo vim /etc/samba/smb.conf

[users]
    path = /home/samba/users
    browseable = yes
    read only = no
    force create mode = 0660
    force directory mode = 2770
    valid users = @sambashare @sadmin

[kksmb]
    path = /home/samba/kksmb
    browseable = no
    read only = no
    force create mode = 0660
    force directory mode = 2770
    valid users = kksmb @sadmin

docs.title: restart smb nmb
docs.text:
sudo systemctl restart smb.service
sudo systemctl restart nmb.service

docs.title: rsa demo
docs.text:
<?php
require __DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php';

use phpseclib\Crypt\RSA;

$plaintext = 'abcdTest';
$outPriKey = "";
$tnPubKey = "";



echo '原始字符串:' . $plaintext . "\n";

$rsa = new RSA();
$rsa->loadKey($outPriKey); //privatekey

//sign with private key

$rsa->setSignatureMode(RSA::SIGNATURE_PKCS1);
$rsa->setHash('sha256');
$signature = $rsa->sign($plaintext);
$hex_signature = bin2hex($signature);
echo '签名后:' . $hex_signature . "\n";

//verify with public key 
$rsa->loadKey($tnPubKey); // public key
$bin_signature = hex2bin($hex_signature);
$verified = $rsa->verify($plaintext, $bin_signature);
echo '验签结果is verified:' . $verified . "\n";

//encrypt by pub key
$rsa->loadKey($tnPubKey); // public key
$rsa->setEncryptionMode(RSA::ENCRYPTION_PKCS1); //注意设置,否则java会nopadding exection
$ciphertext = $rsa->encrypt($plaintext);
$hex_ciphertext = bin2hex($ciphertext);
echo '加密结果:' . $hex_ciphertext . "\n";

//decrypt by private key
$rsa->loadkey($outPriKey);
$dec_text = $rsa->decrypt(hex2bin($hex_ciphertext));
echo '解密结果:' . $dec_text . "\n";
?>

docs.title: 注册表
docs.text:
• https://miuiver.com/press-any-key-to-shutdown/
@echo off
reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\usbflags\18D1D00D0100" /v "osvc" /t REG_BINARY /d "0000" /f
reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\usbflags\18D1D00D0100" /v "SkipContainerIdQuery" /t REG_BINARY /d "01000000" /f
reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\usbflags\18D1D00D0100" /v "SkipBOSDescriptorQuery" /t REG_BINARY /d "01000000" /f
pause

docs.title: linux install & start
docs.text:
• install
cd servers/bin/syncthing
wget https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/download/v1.18.3/syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3.tar.gz
tar zxvf syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3.tar.gz
ln -snf syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3 syncthing
  • start
cd ~/servers/bin/syncthing/syncthing
export HOME=/home/kkqiao
nohup $HOME/servers/bin/syncthing/syncthing/syncthing \
  -gui-address=0.0.0.0:8384 \
  -home=$HOME/servers/data/syncthing \
  -no-browser \
  > $HOME/servers/bin/syncthing/syncthing/syncthing.log 2>&1 &

docs.title: mac install
docs.text:
• install
cd servers/bin/syncthing
wget https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/download/v1.18.3/syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3.tar.gz
tar zxvf syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3.tar.gz
ln -snf syncthing-linux-amd64-v1.18.3 syncthing
  • start
export HOME=/Users/user
nohup $HOME/servers/bin/syncthing/syncthing/syncthing \
  -gui-address=0.0.0.0:8384 \
  -home=$HOME/servers/data/syncthing \
  > $HOME/servers/bin/syncthing/syncthing/syncthing.log 2>&1 &

inoremap ``` ```<CR>```<ESC>ka
